creator: milindnaik1@yahoo.com
text:
Hello there,
    I can not create datasource under solaris 8.0 OS. The datasource created on 
tomcat under linux works fine. But under soliras it throsw following exception.

Cannot load JDBC driver class 'null'
Is this a bug in tomcat ?  Because all the forms replies suggested the same 
sloution of placing Oracles "classes12.JAR" under common/lib directory. This is 
laready done. But no avail. 
Can you throw a light on it please?

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
Please follow up to the tomcat-user mailing list. Bugzilla is not a help-desk forum.

http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/faq/tomcatuser.html
